title: ummmm WTF BLIZZARD?!?!
body:
So I typed League of Legends in a fresh new browser install on Chrome... Top link is Sponsored by Blizzard for Heroes of the Storm.
I LOL'd.

replies.body: if you google pizza hut, first result is domino's.

I think how it works is that one can pay Google money to make their links at the top of search result, which also includes merely related but not exactly the same thing as the searched subject at hand.

Blizz is going all out with their marketing budget I suppose. Can't say I'm surprised, seeing they're trying so hard to dominate every single popular genre there is, from RTS, to ARPG, to MMORPG, then card games and now FPS and MOBA/ARTS.

I say next Blizz game would be a new Diablo Action RPG game in 3rd person perspective starring a lone warrior in a dying/left-behind world, fighting to hold onto or restart the fallen age. I can see the trend.
Not before Overwatch is officially bug-fixed and stuff. The hype for that is real.
Companies will often do this. My favourite from a few years ago was a mispelling of yahoo.com redirected to Google.com. Can't remember the mispelling, but I had a good laugh.

https://i.gyazo.com/8d8f516e100de5d9f1edc3427b7d19f7.png

And then the article below it.
